Articles.Content:
Ive been playing for ages and they have never appeared, Is there a trick to finding them?

Edited June 29, 2015 by leocrumb

Have you upgraded your tracking station yet?

If yes, you should see little question marks in the tracking station in space. Select them, then hit "Track" on the bottom left of the screen. You'll get all the info on them there.

Have you upgraded your tracking station yet?

I feel like an idiot, thanks
